title: Sustainability Energy Competency-Based Professional Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science and energy systems understanding, professional practice experience
context.additional_context: Competency-based education designed for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields to apply sustainable energy concepts in practical settings

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the environmental, economic, and social impacts of sustainable energy technologies and integrate them into expert decision-making models.
Learners can conduct case studies on real-world applications using energy efficiency evaluation tools and propose improvement measures.
Learners can design and write evaluation reports for sustainable energy solutions in team-based projects.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
